mapper.select: select sum(no_real_name_num) as sum_no_real_name_num,short_name, aud_trm,cmcc_prov_prvd_id from hpeapb.sum_smzdjl_prvd where aud_trm = #{currSumEndDate} group by cmcc_prov_prvd_id order by sum_no_real_name_num desc,cmcc_prov_prvd_id

select sum(no_real_name_num) as sum_no_real_name_num,short_name, aud_trm,cmcc_prov_prvd_id from hpeapb.sum_smzdjl_prvd where aud_trm = #{currSumEndDate} and no_real_name_num !=0 group by cmcc_prov_prvd_id order by sum_no_real_name_num desc,cmcc_prov_prvd_id

select sum(no_real_name_num) as sum_no_real_name_num,short_name, aud_trm,cmcc_prov_prvd_id from hpeapb.sum_smzdjl_prvd where aud_trm between #{currSumBeginDate} and #{currSumEndDate} group by aud_trm order by aud_trm asc

select aud_trm,cmcc_prov_prvd_id,short_name,no_real_name_num, tol_subs_num, (no_real_name_per*100) as no_real_name_per, (real_name_per*100) as real_name_per from hpeapb.sum_smzdjl_prvd where aud_trm between #{params.currSumBeginDate} and #{params.currSumEndDate} order by aud_trm desc,no_real_name_num desc,cmcc_prov_prvd_id

select aud_trm,cmcc_prov_prvd_id,short_name,no_real_name_num, tol_subs_num, (no_real_name_per*100) as no_real_name_per, (real_name_per*100) as real_name_per from hpeapb.sum_smzdjl_prvd where aud_trm between #{currSumBeginDate} and #{currSumEndDate} order by aud_trm desc,no_real_name_num desc,cmcc_prov_prvd_id LIMIT #{pageStar},#{pageEnd}
